node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `achievement` ( `achievement_id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code` text COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci, `display` text COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci, `achievement_type` char(50) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `achievement_still_available` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `subtype` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`achievement_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COLLATE=utf8mb3_unicode_ci
node.title: achievement
